abstract: A technology convention may not be the natural venue to introduce a cleaning product. But in an effort to harness the viral marketing of social media, Procter & Gamble is sponsoring an event before the BlogHer 2009 conference in Chicago to roll out a new product.
snippet: A technology convention may not be the natural venue to introduce a cleaning product. But in an effort to harness the viral marketing of social media, Procter & Gamble is sponsoring an event before the BlogHer 2009 conference in Chicago to roll ou...
lead_paragraph: A technology convention may not be the natural venue to introduce a cleaning product. But in an effort to harness the viral marketing of social media, Procter & Gamble is sponsoring a pre-event on Thursday before the BlogHer 2009 conference in Chicago to roll out its updated Swiffer Wet Jet cleaning mop, which will be shipped to stores around Aug. 1.

headline.main: Harnessing Bloggers, Any Way They Can
